__e: So, young man, what were you doing on top of the kitchen counter ?
And Max, did you see what I left over there on the kitchen counter for you?
The big news is, we found this sitting on the kitchen counter. There's a voice mail you're gonna want to hear.
I need that ring back today, so I need you to get back down there behind that counter and find it.
I came in here and saw the bar and all the bottles, and thought, "It all belongs to you alone, like your watch."
I asked him to step out behind the counter and show me his hands, but... he didn't.
I don't know, the whole time he was standing at the counter, insisting only French know how to make decent coffee, with a huge erection.
When I think of all the time I spent behind this counter... crying...alone.
Let's just drop... let's drop it off at the food bank.
